text: got on the train my usual journey to
work and I was holding my phone sending
a message
I had airdrop switched on I'd previously
been using it to share photographs with
them with another iPhone and a picture
appears on the screen
of a man's penis which I was quite
shocked by so I declined the image it's
instinctively and another picture
appeared at which point I realized
somebody nearby was sending them and
that concerned me i felt quite violated
it's and it was very unpleasant thing to
sort of be forced upon my my screen I
was worried then about who else could
have been the recipients it might have
been a child it could have been somebody
more vulnerable than me or that the name
on my airdrop just says Lorraine's
iPhone and so the person sending it
would have known it was a woman it's the
images were of a sexual nature it was it
was quite distressing I decided to call
British Transport Police I was worried
about you know the motives of the person
sending it but also what they might do
next if they could go on to to do
something worse what's the next stage
from sending a you know naked photograph
to a stranger what happens next was he
getting any sort of gratification from
it that's that was all concerning me
